'''Mythcon 31''' was the thirty-first annual [[Mythopoeic Society]] conference.

*'''Theme:''' "Myth and Legend of the Pacific"
*'''Guest of Honor:''' Steven Goldsberry (fantasy author and scholar)
*'''Chairman:''' Steve Brown and Ken Burtness
